Package com.intellij.formatting

Interface FormattingProgressCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FormattingProgressTask

    public interface FormattingProgressCallback
    Defines common interface for receiving events about formatting progress.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FormattingProgressCallback.EventType

    • Method Detail

      • afterWrappingBlock

        void afterWrappingBlock(LeafBlockWrapper wrapped)
        Notifies current indicator that particular code block is wrapped.
        Parameters:
        wrapped - wrapped code block
        See Also:
        FormattingStateId.WRAPPING_BLOCKS

      • afterProcessingBlock

        void afterProcessingBlock(LeafBlockWrapper block)
        Notifies current indicator that given wrapped code block is processed, i.e. its white space is adjusted as necessary.
        Parameters:
        block - processed wrapped block which white space if adjusted
        See Also:
        FormattingStateId.PROCESSING_BLOCKS

      • beforeApplyingFormatChanges

        void beforeApplyingFormatChanges(java.util.Collection<LeafBlockWrapper> modifiedBlocks)
        Notifies current indicator that changes from the given wrapped code blocks are about to be flushed to the underlying document.
        Parameters:
        modifiedBlocks - blocks with modified white spaces which are about to be flushed to the underlying document
        See Also:
        FormattingStateId.APPLYING_CHANGES

      • afterApplyingChange

        void afterApplyingChange(LeafBlockWrapper block)
        Notifies current indicator that change from the given wrapped code block is successfully flushed to the underlying document.
        Parameters:
        block - wrapped code block which change is successfully flushed to the underlying document
        See Also:
        FormattingStateId.APPLYING_CHANGES

      • setTask

        void setTask(SequentialTask task)
        Allows to define an actual formatting task to process.

        I.e. the general idea is that given indicator is provided with the task which will be executed from EDT part by part until the task is finished. That 'part-by-part' processing is assumed to update current indicator (call 'beforeXxx()' and 'afterXxx()' methods).

        Parameters:
        task - formatter task to process

      • addCallback

        boolean addCallback(FormattingProgressCallback.EventType eventType,
                    java.lang.Runnable callback)
        Allows to register callback for the target event type.
        Parameters:
        eventType - target event type
        callback - callback to register for the given event type
        Returns:
        true if given callback is successfully registered for the given event type; false otherwise
